pages.text: Ales and lagers are brewed with the same process. The difference is the type of yeast used during the fermentation process.$(br2).

1. Grow wheat.$(br)2. Place the wheat into the stonecutter to make grain. $(br)3. Roast the grain in the roaster. $(br)4. Place the roasted grain with water in the brew kettle. $(br)5. Place the resulting wort into a fermentation barrel with brewers or lager yeast. $(br)6. Use a glass bottle to draw out the fermented fluid. $(br)7. Enjoy the effects
